bodylog.logic.datahandling

Class Variables

  • java.lang.Object
    • bodylog.logic.datahandling.Variables

  • public class Variables
extends Object
    Contains all definitions of how Variables are converted to strings and back.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • parseLine

        public static Variable parseLine(String line)
                          throws ParsingException,
                                 VariableStateException
        Parses the given line from a move or session file and returns a Variable with the values from the line.
        Parameters:
        line - the line to be parsed
        Returns:
        a Variable with name, type and choices set
        Throws:
        ParsingException - when failing to parse the type from the line
        VariableStateException - when the parsed Variable is not proper
        See Also:
        Names.isAllowed(java.lang.String, bodylog.logic.datahandling.Names.Illegal), Variable.checkState()

      • parseType

        public static Variable.Type parseType(String typeStr)
                               throws ParsingException
        Compares input string to string formats of the enumerator Type in Variable and returns the matching Type.
        Parameters:
        typeStr - the string to be parsed
        Returns:
        a Type whose toString return value matches the string
        Throws:
        ParsingException - when no match is found

      • format

        public static String format(Variable var)
        Formats a Variable into a single line string.
        Parameters:
        var - the Variable to be formatted
        Returns:
        a string describing the contents of the Variable
